word:
Money Stained With the Blood of Souls.--The world and the church may unite in eulogizing the man who has tempted the appetite, and answered the craving of the appetite he has helped to create; they may look with a smile upon him who has helped to debase a man who was formed in the image of 
                                                                           232
God, until that image is virtually effaced; but God looks with a frown upon him, and writes his condemnation in the ledger of death. . . .
